text: Britain's Next Top Model, Cycle 6 is the sixth season of Britain's Next Top Model. This cycle includes 14 contestants. The winner was 18-year-old Tiffany Pisani. ==Prizes== * A modeling contract with Models 1 * A spread & cover in Company Magazine * A Â£100,000 contract with Revlon Cosmetics ==Contestants== (In alphabetical order) * Alisha White * Amba Hudson-Skye * Amelia Thomas * Charlotte Holmes * Delita Cole * Hannah Goodeve * Harleen Kaur Nottay * Joy McLaren * Kirsty Parsons * Nicola Wright * Olivia Oldham-Stevens * Rachelle Harry * Susan Loughnane * Tiffany Pisani ==Episodes== 1\. casting episode 2\. *Best: Joy McLaren *Worst: Delita Cole & Hannah Goodeve *Eliminated: Hannah Goodeve 3\. *Best: Nicola Wright *Worst: Rachelle Harry & Olivia Oldham- Stevens *Eliminated: Rachelle Harry 4\. *Eliminated Outside Of Judging Panel: Susan Loughnane *Best: Alisha White *Worst: Amelia Thomas & Harleen Kaur Nottay *Eliminated: Harleen Kaur Nottay 5\. *Best: Nicola Wright *Worst: Delita Cole & Tiffany Pisani *Eliminated: Delita Cole 6\. *Best: Charlotte Holmes *Worst: Amba Hudson-Skye & Nicola Wright *Eliminated: Amba Hudson-Skye 7\. *Best: Olivia Oldham-Stevens *Worst: Amelia Thomas & Nicola Wright *Eliminated: Nicola Wright 8\. *Best: Charlotte Holmes *Worst: Alisha White & Kirsty Parsons *Eliminated: Kirsty Parsons 9\. *Best: Alisha White *Worst: Olivia Oldham Stevens & Tiffany Pisani *Eliminated: Olivia Oldham-Stevens 10\. *Best: Alisha White *Worst: Charlotte Holmes & Joy McLaren *Eliminated: None 11\. *Best: Joy McLaren *Worst: Charlotte Holmes & Amelia Thomas *Eliminated: Amelia Thomas 12\. *Best: Tiffany Pisani *Worst: Charlotte Holmes & Alisha White *Eliminated: Charlotte Holmes 13\. *Final Three: Alisha White, Joy McLaren & Tiffany Pisani *Eliminated: Joy McLaren *Final Two: Alisha White & Tiffany Pisani *Winner: Tiffany Pisani Category:Britain's Next Top Model
title: Britain's Next Top Model, Cycle 6
